settings.subtitle: Be a Fitter & Faster Field Hockey Player

settings.sub_title: How Field Hockey Players Benefit from GPS

settings.text: This guide shows how every field hockey player can benefit from wearing a GPS Player Vest. Get Fitter and run faster. GPS trackers measure key metrics related to the three core pillars of performance: Speed, Distance, and Intensity. It provides detailed insights into a player's movements, helping to enhance performance. Through understanding how these metrics interact, players can push their limits and achieve their personal bests consistently on the pitch. Learn more about how GPS field hockey trackers work and the crucial data they record in the sections below.

In field hockey, speed is a crucial element that can make or break a player's performance. The fast nature of field hockey demands quick reflexes and explosive power. Whether it's sprinting to intercept a pass or rapidly changing direction to evade an opponent, speed plays a vital role at every turn.

Players need to traverse long distances on the hockey field in order to be in the right position to make plays. The ability to cover ground quickly can make a huge difference in a game, as it allows players to be in the right place at the right time.

Field hockey players need to be highly focused and driven in order to maintain their intensity throughout the game. The physical demands of the sport, such as the need to cover large distances quickly and engage in physical contact with other players, require a high level of stamina and endurance.

settings.title: How do GPS field hockey trackers work?
settings.bold_text: In field hockey, GPS trackers, often embedded in wearable gear, provide critical insights into player movements and performance.

settings.text: The PitcheroGPS Tracker is your ultimate tool for game-changing performance insights. It accurately records key metrics to help you excel on the hockey field. Track your Total Distance covered during a game or training, reach your Top Speed, and record your Total Active Time to monitor your stamina. The tracker also records High Speed Running, assessing the frequency and intensity of your sprints, and records impacts.

Distance tracking offers crucial insights into a field hockey player's match fitness, and serves as a performance improvement gauge across the season.

Key benefits include:

  • Highlight stamina and fatigue levels
  • Build a picture of a playerâ€™s capabilities
  • Provides distance data for coaches

Precisely measure top speed, providing essential insights for players aiming to get faster and fitter on the hockey field.

Key benefits include:

  • Identifying current top speed
  • Tracking your speed progress
  • Fuels healthy competition between teamates

Measuring accelerations and decelerations during field hockey games provides unique insights into a player's dynamic movement skills and readiness to perform.

Key benefits include:

  • Evaluates player agility and reaction times
  • Helps design training for rapid speed changes
  • Assists in monitoring and reducing injury risk
